}} "'Pilots'" is an electronic song written by British group Goldfrapp for their
debut studio album [[Felt Mountain]] (2000). The song was produced by Goldfrapp
and received a positive reception from music critics. It was released as a
double A-side single with "Lovely Head" in the fourth quarter of 2001, and
became the band's second single to chart within the top seventy-five in the
United Kingdom. [http://www.chartstats.com/artistinfo.php?id=126 "Chart Stats:
Goldfrapp"]. ChartStats.com. Retrieved 2 December 2008.
